prompts.question: What is the main feature of the comfyui-clip-with-break extension?
prompts.answer: The comfyui-clip-with-break extension provides a CLIP text encoder that uses BREAK formatting like A1111 (uses chained ComfyUI conditioning concat).

prompts.question: What is the purpose of AdvancedCLIPTextEncodeWithBreak?
prompts.answer: AdvancedCLIPTextEncodeWithBreak provides advanced text encoding, leveraging the code from https://github.com/BlenderNeko/ComfyUI_ADV_CLIP_emb.

prompts.question: How does CLIPTextEncodeWithBreak handle text formatting?
prompts.answer: CLIPTextEncodeWithBreak handles text formatting using the BREAK format, such as A1111.

prompts.question: What technique does comfyui-clip-with-break use for chaining conditioning?
prompts.answer: The comfyui-clip-with-break extension uses chained ComfyUI conditioning concat for chaining conditioning.

prompts.question: From which repository is the code for AdvancedCLIPTextEncodeWithBreak derived?
prompts.answer: The code for AdvancedCLIPTextEncodeWithBreak is derived from https://github.com/BlenderNeko/ComfyUI_ADV_CLIP_emb.
